content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 7, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 7, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1.
Goal!  Barcelona 7, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1. Karim Bellarabi (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Simon Rolfes.
Foul by Sergio Busquets (Barcelona).
Stefan Kießling (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Bernd Leno.
Attempt saved. Cristian Tello (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas with a through ball.
Corner,  Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Conceded by Javier Mascherano.
Stefan Kießling (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Javier Mascherano (Barcelona).
Goal!  Barcelona 7, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 0. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Seydou Keita.
Foul by Karim Bellarabi (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Seydou Keita (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Stefan Reinartz.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Daniel Schwaab.
Foul by Karim Bellarabi (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).
Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Bastian Oczipka replaces Renato Augusto.
Offside, Barcelona. Lionel Messi tries a through ball, but Pedro is caught offside.
Substitution, Barcelona. Marc Muniesa replaces Adriano.
Goal!  Barcelona 6, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 0. Cristian Tello (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dani Alves.
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Stefan Kießling (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).
Goal!  Barcelona 5, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 0. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom right corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Gonzalo Castro.
Foul by Lionel Messi (Barcelona).
Michal Kadlec (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Barcelona 4, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 0. Cristian Tello (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas with a through ball.
Substitution, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Karim Bellarabi replaces Eren Derdiyok.
Substitution, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. André Schürrle replaces Lars Bender.
Attempt missed. Eren Derdiyok (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the left misses to the right. Assisted by Simon Rolfes.
Substitution, Barcelona. Seydou Keita replaces Xavi.
Substitution, Barcelona. Cristian Tello replaces Andrés Iniesta.
Foul by Dani Alves (Barcelona).
Michal Kadlec (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Barcelona 3, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 0. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas with a through ball.
Attempt blocked. Simon Rolfes (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Dani Alves (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Xavi following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Ömer Toprak.
Second Half begins Barcelona 2, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 0.
First Half ends, Barcelona 2, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 0.
Gonzalo Castro (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Gonzalo Castro (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).
Attempt saved. Pedro (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
